name: Mission One (BreixoGames)
description:
A simple 2D shooter game

Only playable in browser,   move using keyboard and shoot with spacebar.

You will level up when you kill 100 + 1 enemies

I hope you have fun trying out the 4 levels.

Audio on/off - a

Try not to die soon

Enjoy it!!!!
